title: com.temando.generic.identifiable+v1
description: This is the schema for an identifiable Temando document object, all identifiable objects must pass this schema in their raw form

id.description: A globally unique identifier for the object

createdAt.description: The date and time this object was first created, represented as defined by RFC 3339, Section 5.6

integrationId.description: The id of the integration you wish to talk to
